daily_fact: Today in NYC: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: A state of emergency has been declared in NYC, Long Island, and Westchester County due to a nor'easter, while a glass window fell from a skyscraper in Midtown, and three firefighters were injured in a Brooklyn fire.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts

community.title: Community
community.summary_md:
